original_text: His name was Daniel, but the king called him Belteshazzar. He was very clever and he knew many things. He could explain what dreams mean. He could find the answer to difficult problems. Send somebody to bring Daniel here. He will tell you what these words mean.’
korean_text: 왕이 벨드사살이라 이름하는 이 다니엘은 마음이 민첩하고 지식과 총명이 있어 능히 꿈을 해석하며 은밀한 말을 밝히며 의문을 풀 수 있었나이다 이제 다니엘을 부르소서 그리하시면 그가 그 해석을 알려 드리리이다 하니라

sentences.original_text: but the king called him Belteshazzar
He could explain what dreams mean
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 꿈의 의미를 설명할 수 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: He could find the answer to difficult problems
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 어려운 문제에 대한 답을 찾을 수 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: Send somebody to bring Daniel here
He will tell you what these words mean
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 이 말씀들의 의미를 알려줄 것입니다
